aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-4517-386 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 06/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 09/11/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 07/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 10/11/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 11/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
